alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:29AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hancock, Henderson, southwestern Warren, northwestern McDonough, southwestern Mercer, southeastern Des Moines and northeastern Lee Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1028 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Iowa Army Ammunition Plant to near Colmar. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Burlington around 1035 AM CDT. Burlington and Gulf Port around 1040 AM CDT. Blandinsville around 1045 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Macomb, Gladstone, Sciota, Oquawka, Good Hope and Rozetta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
